Sports and Clubs: To develop women`s sports; especially professional games like cricket, football, etc.
Social And Cultural Activities: Participating in and studying regional and local social customs; interacting with women and children of all levels of social strata; identifying rare and unusual cases of disease and sickness among women and children in remote areas; imparting awareness of Fundamental and Human Rights and legal remedies to people in remote and inaccessible hilly areas; studying the effects of civilisation on tribal and backward cultures
Special Interests: Identification and targeting of specific cases of injustice of police against women and underprivileged; to work for womens empowerment and development of the underprivileged child;and visiting primary health centres for verification of complaints against doctors and staff for negligence and misbehaviour with patients.
Educational Qualifications: Graduate Educated at Guru Ghasidas University,Bilaspur, Chhattisgarh
